mapper.select: select deptCd, empNm, num2, jpgLink,polyNm,origNm,reeleGbnNm, point from TBL_PALIAMENT
select * from tbl_paliament where polyNm like '${param1}%' and orignm like '${param2}%' and empnm like '${param3}%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_paliament(deptCd, num2, jpgLink, empNm, origNm, reeleGbnNm, polyNm, shrtNm) values(#{deptCd}, #{num2}, #{jpgLink}, #{empNm}, #{origNm}, #{reeleGbnNm}, #{polyNm}, #{shrtNm})
mapper.select: SELECT paliament_talk_seq, title, writer, TO_CHAR(writeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as writeDate, catego, num FROM paliament_talk where num = #{num}

select paliament_talk_seq, title, writer, TO_CHAR(writeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as writeDate, catego, num, viewcnt, good from (select rownum rn, paliament_talk_seq, title, writer, writeDate, catego, num, viewcnt, good from (select paliament_talk_seq, title, writer, writeDate, catego, num, viewcnt, good from paliament_talk where num = '${param1}' order by paliament_talk_seq desc) order by rn) where rn between #{param2} and #{param3}
mapper.insert: insert into paliament_talk(PALIAMENT_TALK_SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, ID, WRITEDATE, CATEGO, NUM, CONTENT, GOOD, VIEWCNT) values(paliament_talk_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{id}, sysdate, #{catego}, #{num}, #{content}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT paliament_talk_seq, title, writer, id, TO_CHAR(writeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as writeDate, catego, num, content, filename, good, viewcnt FROM paliament_talk where paliament_talk_seq = #{seq}
SELECT paliament_talk_seq, title, content from paliament_talk where paliament_talk_seq = #{param1} and id=#{param2}

select no, co_no, content, writer, id, to_char(regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as regdate, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder from paliament_talk_comment where no = #{param1} and depth = 1 order by grpno, co_no asc

select no, co_no, content, writer, id, to_char(regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as regdate, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder from paliament_talk_comment where no = #{param1} and depth = 0 order by grpno, co_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into paliament_talk_comment(no, co_no, content, writer, id, regdate, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder) values(#{no}, paliament_talk_comment_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{writer}, #{id}, sysdate, 0, 0, paliament_talk_comment_seq.currval, #{depth}, 0)

insert into paliament_talk_comment(no, co_no, content, writer, id, regdate, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder) values(#{no}, paliament_talk_comment_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{writer}, #{id}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{grpno}, #{depth}, 0)
mapper.update: update paliament_talk_comment set content = #{content} where co_no = #{co_no}
mapper.select: select no as deptcd, co_no, content, writer, id, regdate, regdatePO, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder ,p.jpglink as img ,p.empnm as name, p.num2 as no, p.orignm as orignm from (select no, co_no, content, writer, id, regdate, regdatePO, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder from (select no, co_no, content, writer, id, to_char(regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as regdate, to_char(regdate+1,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') as regdatePO, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder from paliament_talk_comment where depth = 0) where rownum <= 10) ptc, tbl_paliament p where ptc.no = p.deptcd order by grpno, co_no asc

select no as deptcd, co_no, content, writer, id, regdate, regdatePO, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder ,p.jpglink as img ,p.empnm as name, p.num2 as no, p.orignm as orignm from (select no, co_no, content, writer, id, to_char(regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as regdate, to_char(regdate+1,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') as regdatePO, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder from paliament_talk_comment where depth = 0) ptc, tbl_paliament p where ptc.no = p.deptcd order by no, co_no asc

select no as deptcd, co_no, content, writer, id, regdate, good, bed, grpno, depth, grporder ,p.jpglink as img ,p.empnm as name, p.num2 as no, p.orignm as orignm from paliament_talk_comment ptc, (select * from tbl_paliament where polyNm like '${param1}%' and orignm like '${param2}%' and empnm like '${param3}%') p where ptc.no = p.deptcd order by no, co_no asc
